snippet.title: Monster Taming Direct 2024 - Tupi, The Legend of Araribóia Teaser
snippet.description:
Teaser of the game Tupi - The Legend of Araribóia, premiered at the Monster Taming Direct event. 

Tupi: The Legend of Arariboia is a turn-based roguelite role-playing game based on the story of the Indigenous hero Araribóia and the set of myths that make up South American native mythology as a whole.

Links for the game and the original MTD video in the comments ;)
